Hi,

Internet archive has a dedicated format to contain meta-data about the=
 documents stored in ARC files (called DAT files) [1]. Most importantly, it=
 contains the URLs Heritrix found during the crawl of the pages. How can I =
create such DAT files in Heritrix (or generate them from ARC or WARC files?=
)

Thanks!
Tadas Blinda

References:
[1] http://www.archive.org/web/researc=
her/dat_file_format.php
